恲字的基本解释

恲
pēng
流露：“故礼因人情而为之节文，而仁发恲以见容。”
〔恲恲〕慷慨，如“思比干之恲恲兮，哀子胥之慎事。”
烦闷。

恲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pēng］
［《廣韻》撫庚切，平庚，滂。］
(1)慷慨。参见“恲恲”、“恲性”。
(2)流露，形于顔色。
(3)懑；烦闷。

恲字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　恲； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页386第15
【廣韻】撫庚切【集韻】披耕切，?音怦。【玉篇】滿也。　又忼慨也。　或从朋。

恲字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
恲字的起名意思

暂无。

恲
Basic explanation of words
恲
pēng
Revelation: "The old rituals are based on human sentiments, but benevolence is eager to see."
〔恲恲] Generosity, such as "Thinking about the dryness of arrogance, mourning for Zixu's matter of caution."
Bored.
恲
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [pēng]
["Guangyun" Fu Gengqie, Ping Geng, Pang. ]
(1) Generosity. See also "encouragement", "encouragement".
(2) Reveal, form in color.
(3) Suffering; bored.
恲
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　恲; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Pages: Page 386 and 15
[Guang Yun] Fu Geng Cut [Ji Yun] Phi Geng cut, sound thumping. [Jade articles] It's full.　忼忼忼也.　 Or Cong Peng.

Name meaning
Nothing.
pēng
〈形〉
慷慨 vehement。 如: 怦怦(慷慨, 感慨); 怦性(感慨)
